snippet: The appointment of Mr. Wu, a law professor and former lieutenant governor candidate, is part of an effort by the office to assert itself as a watchdog over technology companies.
abstract: Tim Wu, law professor and former candidate for lieutenant governor, is appointed to serve as senior lawyer and special adviser to New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman.
lead_paragraph: The appointment of Mr. Wu, a law professor and former lieutenant governor candidate, is part of an effort by the office to assert itself as a watchdog over technology companies.

headline.main: Tim Wu, Open Internet Advocate, Joins New York Attorney General’s Office
headline.print_headline: Law Professor Joins Attorney General’s Office; Will Focus on Technology Issues
